column8: Gemini Kid is awarded the title to become the first CWF Heavyweight Champion.
In February 2001, the title is renamed the FWA-Carolinas Cruiserweight Championship when CWF Mid-Atlantic became an official affiliate promotion for the Frontier Wrestling Alliance.
This was the first-ever television episode of CWF Championship Wrestling.
In November 2003, the title was renamed the FWA-Carolinas Television Championship.
